title: Redis 5.9.101 crashed by signal: 8
body:
=== REDIS BUG REPORT START: Cut & paste starting from here ===

29427:M 01 Jan 2020 15:21:12.961 # Crashed running the instruction at: 0x5651b7eebc89
29427:M 01 Jan 2020 15:21:12.961 # Failed assertion: <no assertion failed> (<no file>:0)
